location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Macleod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushere [Bushire] to the Accountant in the Military Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting that the Resident has made the advances requested in the enclosed abstract and muster roll (not present), and requests instructions as to what advances he is authorised to make to sepoys aboard cruizers; the Resident is not certain as to whether he had the authorisation to make the aforementioned advance.
